inputs.name: Path
inputs.label: MSI
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the MSI file to install.

inputs.name: Name
inputs.label: Product Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Product name (BizTalk application) to install. (optional; default is the non-numeric portion of the MSI base file name).
